text: Ūst, ki hamai şumoro az jak tan ʙiefarid. Va az on jak tan zanaşro niz ʙijofarid to ʙa ū oromiş joʙad. Cun ʙo ū jakçoja şud, ʙa ʙore eaʙuk homila şud va muddate ʙo on guzarond. Va cun ʙor sangin gardid, on du Olloh Parvardigori xudro ʙixondand, ki agar moro farzande soleh dihī, az svposguzoron xohem ʙud
